definition: half the work, twice the effect (idiom); the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
meritorious deed or service/achievement/result/service/accomplishment/work (physics)
(two, three etc) -fold/times (multiplier)/double/to increase or multiply
timely handling doubles the effect and halves the effort/the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
pinyin: ji2 shi2 chu3 li3 , shi4 ban4 gong1 bei4

sentences.english: Unique see-through-window & lighting device for easy monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 獨到的視明窗及照明設備，檢視功能，事半功倍。

sentences.english: When the pupil cooperates willingly， he learns twice as fast and with half the fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 一旦孩子們願意合作，學起來就事半功倍。

sentences.english: Leave metrically together, could get the result of getting twice the result with half the effort.
sentences.chinese: 多管齊下，才能達到事半功倍的效果。

sentences.english: Adopting sustainable architecture will bring China great environmental gains with little effort, writes Pan Jiahua .
sentences.chinese: 發展可持續建築可成爲中國事半功倍的環保努力。

sentences.english: Wear sunglasses, especially the darker ones.
sentences.chinese: 戴上墨鏡，特別是深色的那種，會讓你事半功倍。

sentences.english: Moreover, the Superhelper can help you to get twice the result with half the effort in learning a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 此外，學外語超級小幫手也可助你事半功倍。

sentences.english: Choosing the right option will make your journey more efficient and more economical.
sentences.chinese: 正確的選擇會使你的求學之旅花費更少又事半功倍。

sentences.english: Good design in every field accomplishes the “antigravity” trick of accomplishing more with less.
sentences.chinese: 在任何領域，好的設計都會做到事半功倍。

sentences.english: As long as people have the same ideology, ideological and political work will yield twice the result with half the effort and more effective.
sentences.chinese: 只要人心齊，思想政治工作就會事半功倍，卓有成效。

sentences.english: Management and maintenance of computer science room would maintain most efficient and effective manner.
sentences.chinese: 科學的管理維護電腦將會使機房維護工作事半功倍。

sentences.english: Winning respect enhances all you do.
sentences.chinese: 贏得尊重有了威信會讓你事半功倍。

definition: twice the effort for half the result
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
to produce the opposite of the desired result
lit. sharpening the axe won't make the wood-splitting take longer (idiom)/fig. time invested in preparations is not lost/a beard well lathered is half shaved
pinyin: mo2 dao1 bu4 wu4 kan3 chai2 gong1

definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
to comprehend (new things) by analogy
lit. to paint holding two brushes (idiom); fig. to work on two tasks at the same time/to attack one problem from two angles at the same time
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
grasp this fundamental point and all the rest will follow (idiom)
appropriate/suitable
to pursue unremittingly (idiom); to persevere
to be successful in every endeavor
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
